enhanced_by.reason: The clear method resets the state of the FromBuilder, similar to what addAll does with steps.
The clear method resets the state, and scan method initializes new steps, which can be seen as a form of state reset.
After clearing the state, the build method can be used to verify that the state has been properly reset.
The bindings method can be used to verify that the bindings list has been cleared as expected.
